posts.description: What Journalists Can Learn From Police Seizing a BBC Reporter's Laptop | Motherboard
posts.extended: On Wednesday, it was revealed that UK police used powers under the controversial Terrorism Act to seize the laptop of a BBC journalist.

posts.description: The IRL Fetish – The New Inquiry
posts.extended: The deep infiltration of digital information into our lives has created a fervor around the supposed corresponding loss of logged-off real life.
